item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 15th, 2019: Mixed Live
item.description: Since this was the week of radio firsts and experimentation... I'm taking it one step further and doing this session of Bridging the Gap on DJ gear. So all the songs will be mixed together... it's the closest you'd get to a live set in a nightclub.
item.itunes:summary: Since this was the week of radio firsts and experimentation... I'm taking it one step further and doing this session of Bridging the Gap on DJ gear. So all the songs will be mixed together... it's the closest you'd get to a live set in a nightclub.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 14th, 2019: Valentines Day LIVE!
item.description: Happy Valentine's Day! We taped this show last night in front of a live audience at HPR Gen Listen's Speakeasy.
item.itunes:summary: Happy Valentine's Day! We taped this show last night in front of a live audience at HPR Gen Listen's Speakeasy.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 13th, 2019: New Sounds
item.description: Digging through new music with you on this session of Bridging the Gap.
item.itunes:summary: Digging through new music with you on this session of Bridging the Gap.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 12th, 2019: Fun Beats for Chilly Nights
item.description: Paige Okamura guest hosts this session of Bridging the Gap, mixing in cool beats for these chilly nights. Bits of downtempo mix into mellow neo-soul and hip-hop.
item.itunes:summary: Paige Okamura guest hosts this session of Bridging the Gap, mixing in cool beats for these chilly nights. Bits of downtempo mix into mellow neo-soul and hip-hop.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 11th, 2019: Warm Sounds for Chilly Nights
item.description: It's chilly in the islands (by Hawaii standards). So the music for this session of Bridging the Gap is going to be filled with warm sounds to cuddle up to.
item.itunes:summary: It's chilly in the islands (by Hawaii standards). So the music for this session of Bridging the Gap is going to be filled with warm sounds to cuddle up to.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 8th, 2019: The Friday Swerve
item.description: Keeping the music light and fun for this Friday evening session of Bridging the Gap. A little bossa, latin, disco, hip-hop and acid jazz... and back again.
item.itunes:summary: Keeping the music light and fun for this Friday evening session of Bridging the Gap. A little bossa, latin, disco, hip-hop and acid jazz... and back again.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 7th, 2019: International Clash Day & J Dilla
item.description: Celebrating International Clash Day with a number of other public Radio stations. International Clash Day is an all day long, all across the globe, celebrating music as a tool for social consciousness, and the 40th anniversary of the Clash’s London Calling. It’s anti-racist, and anti-fear, pro-solidarity, pro-unity, and pro-inclusion kind of day and kind of setlist for this session of Bridging the Gap. I'm also working in some of the music from J Dilla who would have been 39 today.
item.itunes:summary: Celebrating International Clash Day with a number of other public Radio stations. International Clash Day is an all day long, all across the globe, celebrating music as a tool for social consciousness, and the 40th anniversary of the Clash’s London Calling. It’s anti-racist, and anti-fear, pro-solidarity, pro-unity, and pro-inclusion kind of day and kind of setlist for this session of Bridging the Gap. I'm also working in some of the music from J Dilla who would have been 39 today.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 6th, 2019: Indie Rock & a little World
item.description: Switching back and forth between indie rock and world music for this session of Bridging the Gap. Working in new music from The Specials, Dexter Story, Y La Bamba, Beck and more.
item.itunes:summary: Switching back and forth between indie rock and world music for this session of Bridging the Gap. Working in new music from The Specials, Dexter Story, Y La Bamba, Beck and more.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 5th, 2019: Hawaiian w/ Paige Okamura
item.description: Paige Okamura, better known as DJ Mermaid from KTUH treats us to an all Hawaiian session of Bridging the Gap.
item.itunes:summary: Paige Okamura, better known as DJ Mermaid from KTUH treats us to an all Hawaiian session of Bridging the Gap.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 4th, 2019: A Mellow Start to the Week
item.description: Mellow vibes dominate this session of Bridging the Gap. We'll be weaving in and out of indie-folk, delicate bossa beats, and mixing in a neat Kali Uchis cover of Bjork's 'Venus as a Boy'.
item.itunes:summary: Mellow vibes dominate this session of Bridging the Gap. We'll be weaving in and out of indie-folk, delicate bossa beats, and mixing in a neat Kali Uchis cover of Bjork's 'Venus as a Boy'.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 1st, 2019: Guest DJ: Nate Chinen
item.description: Writer Nate Chinen is guest DJing this session of Bridging the Gap. He’s the director of editorial content for WBGO Newark, and a contributor for NPR Music. His new book- “Playing Changes: Jazz for the New Century” explores the relicency and survival of Jazz music, and he’s discussing it on Monday night at the Blue Note.
item.itunes:summary: Writer Nate Chinen is guest DJing this session of Bridging the Gap. He’s the director of editorial content for WBGO Newark, and a contributor for NPR Music. His new book- “Playing Changes: Jazz for the New Century” explores the relicency and survival of Jazz music, and he’s discussing it on Monday night at the Blue Note.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~January 31st, 2019: State of Jazz
Bridging the Gap~January 30th, 2019: Eclectic Sessions
item.description: Keeping the music eclectic for this session of Bridging the Gap. Starting out with some modern Jazz and finding our way from there.
item.itunes:summary: Keeping the music eclectic for this session of Bridging the Gap. Starting out with some modern Jazz and finding our way from there.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~January 29th, 2019: Paige Okamura Guest Hosts
item.description: Paige Okamura, better known as DJ Mermaid at KTUH guest hosts this session of Bridging the Gap.
item.itunes:summary: Paige Okamura, better known as DJ Mermaid at KTUH guest hosts this session of Bridging the Gap.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~January 28th, 2019: Chill for Chilly Nights
item.description: Keeping the vibe mellow and chilled this evening on Bridging the Gap, with slow, pretty head nodding beats through the late night airwaves.
item.itunes:summary: Keeping the vibe mellow and chilled this evening on Bridging the Gap, with slow, pretty head nodding beats through the late night airwaves.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~January 25th, 2019: That Friday Night Flow
item.description: Just stringing some songs together for your Friday evening. Going back and forth between Latin Jazz, new light electronic sounds and a little indie rock.
item.itunes:summary: Just stringing some songs together for your Friday evening. Going back and forth between Latin Jazz, new light electronic sounds and a little indie rock.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~January 24th, 2019: A Little More Modern Jazz
item.description: Sticking the the Jazz this evening... with a very loose representation as to what that may mean. Exploring both contemporary and traditional Jazz, with new releases mixed in.
item.itunes:summary: Sticking the the Jazz this evening... with a very loose representation as to what that may mean. Exploring both contemporary and traditional Jazz, with new releases mixed in.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~January 23rd, 2019: Global Curveballs
item.description: For most part... I'm picking music on the fly for this session of Bridging the Gap, but trying to steer towards a more global, more upbeat feeling of exploration.
item.itunes:summary: For most part... I'm picking music on the fly for this session of Bridging the Gap, but trying to steer towards a more global, more upbeat feeling of exploration.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~January 22nd, 2019: Indie Americana
item.description: Exploring a little Indie Americana this evening. Mixing in a little Indie Rock, Country and other surprises.
item.itunes:summary: Exploring a little Indie Americana this evening. Mixing in a little Indie Rock, Country and other surprises.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~January 21st, 2019: MLK Day
item.description: Celebrating this Martin Luther King Jr. Day with timeline of songs. Starting with the civil war, moving through the horror of lynching and slavery, then moving into songs taken from, or inspired by the civil rights movement
item.itunes:summary: Celebrating this Martin Luther King Jr. Day with timeline of songs. Starting with the civil war, moving through the horror of lynching and slavery, then moving into songs taken from, or inspired by the civil rights movement
